mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery (id, sender_id, receiver_id, sending_loc, sending_latitude, sending_longitude, receiving_loc, receiving_latitude, receiving_longitude, sending_dt, receiving_dt, charge_amt, sending_type, receiving_type, item_type, item_width, item_length, item_height, item_weight, item_value) VALUES (#{id}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{sendingLoc}, #{sendingLatitude}, #{sendingLongitude}, #{receivingLoc}, #{receivingLatitude}, #{receivingLongitude}, now(), now(), #{chargeAmt}, #{sendingType}, #{receivingType}, #{itemType}, #{itemWidth}, #{itemLength}, #{itemHeight}, #{itemWeight}, #{itemValue})
INSERT INTO sending (id, sending_dt, sender_confirm, deliverer_confirm, security_info) values(#{id}, now(), false, false, null)
INSERT INTO receiving (id, receiving_dt, receiver_confirm, deliverer_confirm, security_info) values(#{id}, now(), false, false, null)
mapper.update: UPDATE delivery SET deliverer_id=#{delivererId} WHERE id = #{id} and deliverer_id is null
UPDATE sending SET sending_dt=now(), sender_confirm=true WHERE id=#{id} AND sender_confirm=false
UPDATE sending SET sending_dt=now(), deliverer_confirm=true WHERE id=#{id} AND deliverer_confirm=false
UPDATE receiving SET receiving_dt=now(), deliverer_confirm=true WHERE id=#{id} AND deliverer_confirm=false
UPDATE receiving SET receiving_dt=now(),receiver_confirm=true WHERE id=#{id} AND receiver_confirm=false
mapper.select: SELECT party.* FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE grade = #{grade}) AS party JOIN (SELECT * FROM pattern WHERE (#{sendingLatitude} BETWEEN from_location_latitude-0.01 AND from_location_latitude+0.01) AND (#{sendingLongitude} BETWEEN from_location_longitude-0.01 AND from_location_longitude+0.01) AND (#{receivingLatitude} BETWEEN to_location_latitude-0.01 AND to_location_latitude+0.01) AND (#{receivingLongitude} BETWEEN to_location_longitude-0.01 AND to_location_longitude+0.01)) AS pattern ON (party.id=pattern.party_id)

SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT * FROM pattern WHERE party_id=#{id}) AS p JOIN delivery AS d ON ( (d.sending_latitude BETWEEN p.from_location_latitude-0.01 AND p.from_location_latitude+0.01) AND (d.sending_longitude BETWEEN p.from_location_longitude-0.01 AND p.from_location_longitude+0.01) AND (d.receiving_latitude BETWEEN p.to_location_latitude-0.01 AND p.to_location_latitude+0.01) AND (d.receiving_longitude BETWEEN p.to_location_longitude-0.01 AND p.to_location_longitude+0.01) )
SELECT * FROM delivery where sending_loc LIKE '%'||#{sendingLoc}||'%' AND receiving_loc LIKE '%'||#{receivingLoc}||'%' AND deliverer_id is null

SELECT *, d.id as d_id, s.id as s_id, r.id as r_id, d.sending_dt as d_sending_dt, d.receiving_dt as d_receiving_dt, s.sending_dt as s_sending_dt, r.receiving_dt as r_receiving_dt, s.deliverer_confirm as s_deliverer_confirm, r.deliverer_confirm as r_deliverer_confirm, s.security_info as s_security_info, r.security_info as r_security_info FROM ( SELECT * FROM delivery where id = #{id}) as d left outer join sending as s on (d.id=s.id) left outer join receiving as r on (s.id=r.id);
